quizzes.question: In what order do the properties work in the box?
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]The CSS Box Model[/h1]

All HTML elements can be considered as boxes. The CSS box model represents the design and layout of the site. It consists of [b]margins[/b], [b]borders[/b], [b]paddings[/b], and the actual [b]content[/b]. 

The properties work in the same order: [b]top[/b], [b]right[/b], [b]bottom[/b], and [b]left[/b].
